class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class
course_description: Virtually every business is organized around its products and services. This course exposes students to the contemporary challenges faced by a broad variety of firms in developing and launching new products, creating and maintaining brand equity, and managing their product lines. The course is relevant to students whose interests are in general management and consulting as well as those who expect to work directly in brand or product management.
prerequisites: MKT 340 or SPECSTUBUS students or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
